description: Provides details regarding the entity used with the connector, with a description of the data model for each field in that entity.

parameters.name: connectorEntityName
parameters.description: The entity name for that connector.

nested_items.name: connectorEntityFields
nested_items.description: Describes the fields for that connector entity. For example, for an account entity, the fields would be account name, account ID, and so on.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the connector field.

nested_items.name: parentIdentifier
nested_items.description: The parent identifier of the connector field.

nested_items.name: label
nested_items.description: The label applied to a connector entity field.

nested_items.name: isPrimaryKey
nested_items.description: Booelan value that indicates whether this field can be used as a primary key.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: Default value that can be assigned to this field.

nested_items.name: isDeprecated
nested_items.description: Booelan value that indicates whether this field is deprecated or not.

nested_items.name: supportedFieldTypeDetails
nested_items.description: Contains details regarding the supported FieldType, including the corresponding filterOperators and supportedValues.

nested_items.name: fieldType
nested_items.description: The type of field, such as string, integer, date, and so on.

nested_items.name: filterOperators
nested_items.description: The list of operators supported by a field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: supportedValues
nested_items.description: The list of values that a field can contain. For example, a Boolean fieldType can have two values: 'true' and 'false'.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: valueRegexPattern
nested_items.description: The regular expression pattern for the field name.

nested_items.name: supportedDateFormat
nested_items.description: The date format that the field supports.

nested_items.name: fieldValueRange
nested_items.description: The range of values this field can hold.

nested_items.name: maximum
nested_items.description: Maximum value supported by the field.

nested_items.name: minimum
nested_items.description: Minimum value supported by the field.

nested_items.name: fieldLengthRange
nested_items.description: This is the allowable length range for this field's value.

nested_items.name: maximum
nested_items.description: Maximum value supported by the field.

nested_items.name: minimum
nested_items.description: Minimum value supported by the field.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the connector entity field.

nested_items.name: sourceProperties
nested_items.description: The properties that can be applied to a field when the connector is being used as a source.

nested_items.name: isRetrievable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the field can be returned in a search result.

nested_items.name: isQueryable
nested_items.description: Indicates if the field can be queried.

nested_items.name: isTimestampFieldForIncrementalQueries
nested_items.description: Indicates if this timestamp field can be used for incremental queries.

nested_items.name: destinationProperties
nested_items.description: The properties applied to a field when the connector is being used as a destination.

nested_items.name: isCreatable
nested_items.description: Specifies if the destination field can be created by the current user.

nested_items.name: isNullable
nested_items.description: Specifies if the destination field can have a null value.

nested_items.name: isUpsertable
nested_items.description: Specifies if the flow run can either insert new rows in the destination field if they do not already exist, or update them if they do.

nested_items.name: isUpdatable
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the field can be updated during an UPDATE or UPSERT write operation.

nested_items.name: isDefaultedOnCreate
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the field can use the default value during a Create operation.

nested_items.name: supportedWriteOperations
nested_items.description: A list of supported write operations. For each write operation listed, this field can be used in idFieldNames when that write operation is present as a destination option.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: customProperties
nested_items.description: A map that has specific properties related to the ConnectorEntityField.
(string) ---
(string) ---
